article.title: Learning Live Templates for Jetpack Compose
article.author: Matt McKenna
article.excerpt: What are Live Templates? How can they speed up your development? And how to create your own for Jetpack Compose!

authors.bio:
Hi I'm Matt! I spend my days typing on a keyboard creating things for our favorite 
green robot and battling build time boredom.
authors.name: Matt McKenna
